findings.title: Contract owner can manipulate fees
findings.description: The contract owner has powerful admin functions to abuse and manipulate fees, with an enormous passive fee on each transaction directly sent to the team's wallet.

findings.title: Huge fee applied to each transaction and gets redirected into the team's wallet
findings.description: A huge passive fee is applied to each transaction and directly sent to the team's wallet, which can be manipulated by the contract owner.

findings.title: Powerful admin functions that the owner can abuse to manipulate fees
findings.description: The contract owner has powerful admin functions that can be abused to manipulate fees, which could lead to unfair transaction costs.

findings.title: Enormous passive fee on each transaction that is directly sent to the team's wallet
findings.description: There is an enormous passive fee applied to each transaction that gets redirected into the team's wallet.
